name: larkspur
content:

a plant related to the delphinium that grows in gardens and has blue, pink, or white flowers : Larkspur is one of the first flowers to pop up after the snow melts. Annuals such as cornflowers, larkspurs, or marigolds can be allowed to seed themselves at will.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is time to sow annual larkspur for summer blooms.There have been reports of sheep and cattle fatalities caused by ingesting larkspur. The girls decorated the tables with blue larkspur and white canterbury bells..
